response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe would significantly enhance your business operations and bring substantial value to your company. Given its high worth to both us and you, I am extending an exclusive offer to acquire it at a special price of $950,000. This offer is tailored to ensure a mutually beneficial transaction while maximizing my return on investment. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this proposal.", "product_price": 950000}
